body_html: Whenever you instantiate a ValidationMonitor, a deprecation warning is logged, with the text ​ "Monitors are deprecated. Please use tf.train.SessionRunHook." You can use SessionRunHooks to achieve the same thing, although we have none that does it. The reason for that is that this implementation has issues, and we want to provide a better one, which we're working on.
body_text:
Whenever you instantiate a ValidationMonitor, a deprecation warning is
logged, with the text ​

"Monitors are deprecated. Please use tf.train.SessionRunHook."

You can use SessionRunHooks to achieve the same thing, although we have
none that does it. The reason for that is that this implementation has
issues, and we want to provide a better one, which we're working on.
body:
Whenever you instantiate a ValidationMonitor, a deprecation warning is
logged, with the text ​

"Monitors are deprecated. Please use tf.train.SessionRunHook."

You can use SessionRunHooks to achieve the same thing, although we have
none that does it. The reason for that is that this implementation has
issues, and we want to provide a better one, which we're working on.
